title: New champ - halp me name him
body:
So i have a new champ coming to the boards soon, however i haven't got a name, now instead of me telling you everything, we're gonna play a game. i'll give 1 hint every half hour or so up to 3 hours or all hints have been divulged or until one of you guess the skin, lore, and other links

1st hint - he works with riven
2nd hint - he also works with talon
3rd hint - he works for a shade of red
4th hint - from noxus

Since no one guessed and im out of clues, he is the chrimson elite captain a raider of sorts heavy AD top/Tanky top/Assassain

HERE HE IS http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-creations/AAnob6yc-sly-crimson-raider
